Player History
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/11/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Traded from Toronto to San Diego on 3/4/1986 (Going to SD: RF Mark Whiten. Going to TOR: CF Kevin McReynolds)...
Injured on 7/27/1989 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/28/1991, off Bruce Ruffin (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/3/1991, off Kevin J. Brown (ATL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/1991, hitting .550 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won World Series with San Diego in 1991...
Injured on 4/28/1992 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1992, hitting .368 with 8 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/1992, hitting .545 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1992, hitting .351 with 12 HR, 28 RBI...
